Posts.Content: I use sweet almond oil and organic coconut oil works for me you can also try different brands of tamoxifen. I tried s few and wokhardt seems to suit me best with minimal side effects now ! Good luck Tracey
Posts.Title: ER+ breast cancer & vaginal dryness

Posts.Content: That's really great that you had both done together it's such a minefield with surgeons doing reconstruction very different!  I had ld with Becker expandable implant  And not having healthy breast lifted until surgeons happy with reconstruction  So a little bit uneven at the moment but it's not so bad as I am going to have another surgery to up lift healthy breast to match in January he said I had my ld reconstruction on may 4th 2017 all well at the present
Posts.Title: Surgery options when you already have implants

Posts.Content: Btw My reconstruction is under my private health ins so I may request a matching implant for the healthy breast no point in being uneven ! So it does depend on your surgeon I gues he wanted to check the ld flap reconstruction was successful which is has been. Onwards and upwards !
